main event: On March 28, 1962, multiple witnesses at Edwards AFB reported seeing three bright lights in a triangular formation traveling from west to east.
interesting points: The lights traveled in a triangular formation, with two leading and one trailing., The observation lasted for about one minute., The sighting was classified as unidentified by the Air Force., The course of the lights was from westerly to easterly., The sighting took place at 2155 hours.
